actionCalls.description: Used to avert Mixed DML Error
actionCalls.name: Commit_Earlier_DML_Actions
actionCalls.label: Commit Earlier DML Actions

actionCalls.description: Used to avert Mixed DML error
actionCalls.name: Commit_Permission_Assignment
actionCalls.label: Commit Permission Assignment

actionCalls.description: Returns DateTime value for Present Hour Mark, Half Hour Mark or Upcoming Hour Mark based on Minute value of Now() ( Less than 15, 15 to 45 or 46 to 59)
actionCalls.name: Set_Nearest_Half_Hour_Mark
actionCalls.label: Set Nearest Half Hour Mark

assignments.description: Save updated Company value to the Record Variable
assignments.name: Set_Lead_Company
assignments.label: Set Lead Company

assignments.description: Save updated Name and values to the Record Variable
assignments.name: Set_Lead_Name
assignments.label: Set Lead Name

assignments.description: Save updated Name and Company values to the Collection Variable
assignments.name: Set_Lead_Variables
assignments.label: Set Lead Variables

decisions.description: Can convert only 7 mins before TSA Start or within the Appointment window
decisions.name: TSA_Time_and_Owner_Check
decisions.label: TSA Time and Owner Check

formulas.name: formEligibleCompanyName
formulas.expression: NOT( OR( ISBLANK({!recordId.Company}), {!recordId.Company} = '***INSERT COMPANY NAME***', Lower({!recordId.Company}) = 'none', Lower({!recordId.Company}) = 'na', Lower({!recordId.Company}) = 'n/a', Lower({!recordId.Company}) = 'no business', CONTAINS({!recordId.Company},'Personal') ))

formulas.name: formEligibleLeadName
formulas.expression: NOT(OR( {!recordId.FirstName} = '***INSERT FIRST NAME***', ISBLANK({!recordId.FirstName}), {!recordId.LastName} = '***INSERT LAST NAME***', ISBLANK({!recordId.LastName})))

formulas.description: Phrase "was dispositioned No Show" to be appended to Display message
formulas.name: formTextNoShow
formulas.expression: IF(TEXT( {!Todays_No_Show_or_Blank_Dispo.Appointment_Disposition__c})= 'No Show', " that was dispositioned No Show", IF(AND({!No_Future_Appts},ISBLANK(TEXT( {!Todays_No_Show_or_Blank_Dispo.Appointment_Disposition__c})))," that was not dispositioned",""))

recordLookups.description: Get TSA or Formation Appointment from future.
recordLookups.name: Future_TSA_or_Formation
recordLookups.label: Future TSA or Formation

recordLookups.description: Get TSA or Formation Appointment from today - No Show or Blank Disposition
recordLookups.name: Todays_No_Show_or_Blank_Dispo
recordLookups.label: Today's No Show or Blank Dispo
recordLookups.filterLogic: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND (4 OR 5) AND 6 AND 7

fields.name: Display_Warning
fields.fieldText: **Select 'Yes' only if you are actively talking to the Prospect**

fields.name: DisplayErrorMessage1
fields.fieldText: ﻿You cannot convert this lead unless a TSA is assigned to you or a live pitch is being conducted.

fields.name: Display_Existing_Appt_Details
fields.fieldText:
• We found a {!varExistingAppt.Type_of_Appointment__c} appointment scheduled for {!varExistingAppt.StartDateTime} assigned to {!varExistingAppt.Assigned_To__c}{!formTextNoShow}.
  • Per the rules of Engagement, you must reach out to {!varExistingAppt.Assigned_To__c} and {!varExistingAppt.Sales_Manager__c} in GChat to see if they are available to speak to the prospect﻿

fields.name: Display_Transferred
fields.fieldText: ﻿﻿If they are available, Live Transfer the prospect over and click Exit.﻿

fields.name: Display_Pitched
fields.fieldText: If {!varExistingAppt.Assigned_To__c} and {!varExistingAppt.Sales_Manager__c} do not respond within 60 seconds, click Pitch.

fields.name: Display_Invalid_Name
fields.fieldText: Enter valid First and Last Name

validationRule.errorMessage: Name cannot contain "Insert" or "Name" or "Last"

fields.name: Display_Name_Guidelines
fields.fieldText: First Name and Last Name cannot be Blank or have words like "Insert", "Name", "First" or "Last"

validationRule.errorMessage: Invalid Company Name. Check provided guidelines to fix it.
validationRule.formulaExpression: NOT( OR( {!Company_Name}= "***INSERT COMPANY NAME***", LOWER({!Company_Name})= "none", LOWER({!Company_Name})= "na", LOWER({!Company_Name})= "n/a", LOWER({!Company_Name})= "no business", CONTAINS({!Company_Name}, "Personal") ))

fields.name: Display_CompanyName_Guidelines
fields.fieldText: Examples of Invalid Company Names : '***INSERT COMPANY NAME***, 'None', 'NA', 'n/a', 'No business', Personal etc.

fields.name: Display_NoName_Guideline
fields.fieldText: If Company Name is not known, Enter the Lead's Full Name for Company Name.

fields.name: Display_Personal_CompanyName
fields.fieldText: If the Company Name has the word 'Personal', remove it and add it back after Lead conversion.

fields.name: FinishToExit
fields.fieldText: Click Finish to Exit

subflows.description: Grants Set Audit Field Permission Set. Includes custom Permission used to override Event Validation rules and Set Audit Field restrictions
subflows.name: Grant_Override_Permissions
subflows.label: Grant Override Permissions

subflows.description: Revokes the Set Audit Fields permission set that was granted earlier.
subflows.name: Revoke_Override_Permissions
subflows.label: Revoke Override Permissions

subflows.description: Revokes the Set Audit Fields permission set that was granted earlier.
subflows.name: Revoke_Override_Permissions2
subflows.label: Revoke Override Permissions

subflows.description: Revokes the Set Audit Fields permission set that was granted earlier.
subflows.name: Revoke_Override_Permissions3
subflows.label: Revoke Override Permissions
